OK Your Goals We understand that your goals may change over time. Visit your profile any time to update. OK Your Interests You are more effective and stay motivated longer when you learn from topics you care about. Adjust your interests any time by visiting your profile. OK Notice Please choose at least 1 option. OK Updating… sign in with Travel Business Chinese Proficiency Test Education Daily Communication Phrases Language Learning Survival Skills News Understanding China Funny Conversations Music Beginner 1 You do not speak Chinese or speak only a little bit of Chinese. Beginner 2 You can conduct basic conversations and ask simple questions in Chinese. Intermediate 1 You can already communicate confidently about familiar topics related to your interests. You are able to understand the context of a conversation and to take part in an exchange. Intermediate 2 You can communicate confidently in Chinese on both routine and non-routine matters related to your interests. Advanced 1 You can communicate with and understand native Chinese speakers in everyday situations with little miscommunication but still make occasional mistakes. Advanced 2 You can interact with native Chinese speakers in wide variety of situations and express yourself with grammatical accuracy and a broad range of vocabulary. Status Notes Badges learning goal overall level progress pronunciation speaking listening No tutor notes Finish : %1$s class summary vocab grammar pronunciation Speaking Listening Time based Course based Social based Rating and Reviews UPDATE : %1$s Credits % Complete %1$s/%2$s Lessons Complete Package booking rules Course Structure Ticket design AUTOFILL Autofill lets you choose the times of the week you want to study and will automatically fill in both the correct lessons and best available tutor for those times. E.g. Choose Monday and Tuesday at 7pm and a schedule will appear for a month’s worth of scheduled classes on Monday and Tuesdays at 7pm. Please note that package users must book at least one lesson per seven days. Welcome to the package booking system. Packages are full courses sold together with booking rules for a discount price. We recommend packages because they are 1.) the most convenient choice 2.) provide the best learning results. Courses are designed to take you step–by–step through an HSK standard level. Courses are comprised of 25–30 ordered ‘lessons’ and ‘supplements.’ Lessons are 50 minutes and teach new fundamental concepts and skills. Supplements are also 50 minutes and review previously learned concepts with more in–depth exploration. Each lesson is shown as a ticket with the time, tutor, and lesson. Tickets can be changed at any time at least 24 hours before the booked lesson starts. If you try to change or cancel within 24 hours, your credits will be forfeited, and the autofill will adjust your lessons order. START NOW learn more PACKAGE Package Lesson:  Supplement:  Completed Lessons Booking Course Structure Courses are designed to take you step–by–step through an HSK standard level. Each course is comprised of 25–30 ordered ‘lessons’ and ‘supplements.’ Lessons are 50 minutes and teach new fundamental concepts and skills. Supplements are also 50 minutes and review previously learned concepts with more in–depth exploration. Just choose the weekly day and time when you want to take classes and the tutor. Autofill will book your prefered weekly classes automatically. E.g. choose Monday 9:00 pm and apply. The system will book all the upcoming mondays at 9:00 pm as long as it is necessary. Facebook Twitter Pinterest Mail SHARE Favorite Course Tutor Topic WhatsOn Notifications TutorMandarin Notice Start class No new notifications Today Yesterday sign in sign up -Free $20 Class
-2 Unlocked Courses
-Full Language Evaluation
-Free Daily Articles and Videos FREE $20 CLASS All students get a 1-on-1 class with a professional tutor (a $20 value) for free with sign up.

Take class either on your phone or through our PC platform. Each class comes with a PDF lesson and full language evaluation. " 2 UNLOCKED COURSES Never learned Chinese? No worries.

Our Pinyin and Beginner 1 courses are both unlocked to all users that sign up. Enjoy them for free! Intermediate and Advanced courses have one unlocked lesson each. FREE Daily Chinese Articles and Videos We update our app almost everyday with new articles and videos about learning Chinese, useful phrases, interesting news, language learning tips, and more! All content comes with its own unique set of flashcards to help you along. “A ONE-STOP-SHOP!” "This app has everything I need for learning Chinese! I can study flashcards on the subway and take face-to-face lessons at home from a real instructor… all using my smartphone!" ~Brian - Ireland Free Trial Class Notice Please enter a valid phone number. You use your promo code Enjoy a 1-on-1 Chinese trial class with my TutorMandarin promo code: %1$s. Adults + Kids Mandarin courses. Learn to really SPEAK the language! No promotion code history. I entered Refer by me PROMO CODE LIST Code Type Date Reward Loading Waiting Name Date Reward Loading Waiting I have promo code All Phrases Language Learning Conversations Survival Skills Understanding China Funny Readable Chinese All Understanding China Language Learning Music Funny News Food Entertainment Relationships Hobbies Travel Culture Social Exercise All Pinyin Beginner 1 Beginner 2 Intermediate 1 Intermediate 2 Advanced 1 Advanced 2 Speaking Chinese starts with Pinyin. Learn how the correct pronunciation fundamentals of Mandarin. Develop a strong foundation in Chinese with particular focus on practical speaking and listening. Strengthen your basic spoken Chinese with fundamental grammar, vocabulary, and more. Learn more specialized Chinese grammar patterns, phrases, as well as vocabulary relevant to your interests. Become confident with daily conversations and learn more advanced sentence structures based on practical topics. Advanced 1 Advanced 2 Talk about everything food related in Chinese - dishes, etiquette, ordering, preparation, and more. Discuss how you spend your free time and what you do for entertainment using modern, practical Chinese. Learn how to communicate in Chinese within various types of relationships - romantic, familial, professional, or otherwise. Use Chinese to discuss a variety of hobbies including photography, music, movies, books, and more. Deepen your knowledge about the Chinese culture through related topics, stories, and history. Learn practical Chinese for traveling in China with classes on tickets, transportation, attractions, small talk, and more. Use Chinese to discuss deeper social issues on topics such as environment, economy, politics, and more. Talk about everything exercise related so you can discuss both your own fitness habits as well as popular sports culture. FREE 1-on-1 Trial Class 1-on-1 Chinese Class

EXPERIENCE NOW LATER Take Free Trial Today CONFIRM Hello, this is your TutorMandarin consultant. Would you like to take your free trial today? Your class has been reserved at %1$s, please check to confirm. Thanks for signing up for TutorMandarin. We will send you one-time SMS Message. Hi, looks like you are trying to purchase before taking your trial class! Reminder: the trial class is free and comes with a full language evaluation from a professional tutor. It will help you choose the right level for your lesson. \n\nHowever, you can purchase now without taking the trial. You will forfeit your trial class in return for 1 free credit to use toward your next purchase. The choice is up to you. Good luck! Buy Credits Take Trial Try Demo Classroom Student CONSULTANT Can’t see the tutor’s video Can’t see the student video Can’t send messages Can’t upload PDF Can’t save file Can’t video record lesson Websocket disconnect Internet connection unstable Can only see whiteboard tools moving? What happens if the student leaves the class? What happens if tutor leaves the class? How to join class? How to know if i’ve successfully joined class? How to leave class? Does it matter if student or tutor leaves first? How to zoom in Whiteboard? How to move the screen? Can I print? a. Check the network connection with the link: http://www.speedtest.net/ b. Check if the audio works or not c. Quit from the current classroom and rejoin again a. Check if the camera works properly b. Check if the camera works successfully in other software (Skype, QQ, etc) a. Quit from the current classroom and rejoin again. b. If not working, alert your tutor. They can address the problem from their side You are not allowed to upload PDF file. This feature is not currently active in our whiteboard a. This feature is not currently active in our whiteboard b. The system does automatic recorded depending on the company’s preferences Quit from the current classroom and rejoin again. a. Check the network connection with the link: http://www.speedtest.net/ b. Quit from the current classroom and rejoin again Quit from the current classroom and rejoin again If student meets problems in classroom, contact consultant to get support. If tutor leave classroom by exception, try to rejoin it as first choice. If it still failed, ask consultant to check what happened. a. Login the student side. b. Check the coming up schedule class. c. Click item in calendar. d. After the tutor click \'join\' at the backend, the \'Start class\' button will become green from light green. e. Click \'Start class\' to join the classroom. a. Whiteboard works b. Message sends successfully c. Can see each other d. Can hear each other Click \'Leave\' in the top left or press back button It doesn\'t matter. Whether a student leaves first or tutor leaves first, a new feedback page will be shown. a. Use the tool on the right hand side. b. Use two finger to pinch in or pinch out. Use the whiteboard tool on the left side. No
